ayas.text: barā-atun minallāhi warasūlihi ilal ladhīna `āhadtum minal mushrikīn
fasīḥū fil-arḍi arba`ata ash-hurin wa`lamū annakum ghayru mu`jizillāhi wa-annallāha mukhzil kāfirīn

wa-adhānun minallāhi warasūlihi ilan nāsi yawmal ḥajjil-akbari annallāha barī-un minal mushrikīna warasūluh ۚ fa-in tubtum fahuwa khayrul lakum ۖ wa in tawallaytum fa`lamū annakum ghayru mu`jizillāh ۗ wabashhiril ladhīna kafarū bi`adhābin alīm
illal ladhīna `āhadtum minal mushrikīna thumma lam yanquṣūkum shay-an walam yuẓāhirū `alaykum aḥadan fa-atimmū ilayhim `ahdahum ilā muddatihim ۚ innallāha yuḥibbul muttaqīn

fa-idhan-salakhal-ash-hurul ḥurumu faqtulul mushrikīna ḥaythu wajadtumūhum wakhudhūhum wāḥṣurūhum waq`udū lahum kulla marṣad ۚ fa-in tābū wa-aqāmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātawuz zakāta fakhallū sabīlahum ۚ innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm
wa in aḥadun minal mushrikīnas-tajāraka fa-ajirhu ḥattā yasma`a kalāmallāhi thumma abligh-hu ma-manah ۚ dhālika bi-annahum qawmul lā ya`lamūn
kayfa yakūnu lil-mushrikīna `ahdun `indallāhi wa`inda rasūlihi illal ladhīna `āhadtum `indal masjidil ḥarām ۖ famas-taqāmū lakum fastaqīmū lahum ۚ innallāha yuḥibbul muttaqīn
kayfa wa in yaẓharū `alaykum lā yarqubū fīkum illan walā dhimmah ۚ yurḍūnakum bi-afwāhihim wata-bā qulūbuhum wa-aktharuhum fāsiqūn
ish-taraw bi-āyātillāhi thamanan qalīlan faṣaddū `an sabīlih ۚ innahum sā-a mā kānū ya`malūn
lā yarqubūna fī mu-minin illan walā dhimmah ۚ wa-ulā-ika humul mu`tadūn
fa-in tābū wa-aqāmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātawuz zakāta fa-ikhwānukum fid dīn ۗ wanufaṣṣilul-āyāti liqawmiy ya`lamūn
wa in nakathū aymānahum min ba`di `ahdihim waṭa`anū fī dīnikum faqātilū a-immatal kufri innahum lā aymāna lahum la`allahum yantahūn
alā tuqātilūna qawman nakathū aymānahum wahammū bi-ikhrājir rasūli wahum bada-ūkum awwala marrah ۚ atakhshawnahum ۚ fallāhu aḥaqqu an takhshawhu in kuntum mu-minīn
qātilūhum yu`adhhibhumullāhu bi-aydīkum wayukhzihim wayanṣurkum `alayhim wayashfi ṣudūra qawmin mu-minīn
wayudh-hib ghayẓa qulūbihim ۗ wayatūbullāhu `alā man yashā-u ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm
am ḥasibtum an tutrakū walammā ya`lamillāhul ladhīna jāhadū minkum walam yattakhidhū min dūnillāhi walā rasūlihi walal mu-minīna walījah ۚ wallāhu khabīrun bimā ta`malūn
mā kāna lil-mushrikīna an ya`murū masājidallāhi shāhidīna `alā anfusihim bil kufr ۚ ulā-ika ḥabiṭat a`māluhum wafin nāri hum khālidūn
innamā ya`muru masājidallāhi man āmana billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri wa-aqāmaṣ ṣalāta wa-ātaz zakāta walam yakhsha illallāh ۖ fa`asā ulā-ika an yakūnū minal muhtadīn
aja`altum siqāyatal ḥājji wa`imāratal masjidil ḥarāmi kaman āmana billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri wajāhada fī sabīlillāh ۚ lā yastawūna `indallāh ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmaẓ ẓālimīn
alladhīna āmanū wahājarū wajāhadū fī sabīlillāhi bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim a`ẓamu darajatan `indallāh ۚ wa-ulā-ika humul fā-izūn
yubashhiruhum rabbuhum biraḥmatim minhu wariḍwānin wajannātin lahum fīhā na`īmun muqīm
khālidīna fīhā abadā ۚ innallāha `indahu ajrun `aẓīm
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū lā tattakhidhū ābā-akum wa ikhwānakum awliyā-a inis-taḥabbul kufra `alal-iymān ۚ wa man yatawallahum minkum fa-ulā-ika humuẓ ẓālimūn

qul in kāna ābā-ukum wa-abnā-ukum wa ikhwānukum wa-azwājukum wa`ashīratukum wa-amwālunq-taraftumūhā watijāratun takhshawna kasādahā wa masākinu tarḍawnahā aḥabba ilaykum minallāhi warasūlihi wajihādin fī sabīlihi fatarabbaṣū ḥattā ya-tiyallāhu bi-amrih ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmal fāsiqīn
laqad naṣarakumullāhu fī mawāṭina kathīratin wayawma ḥunaynin idh a`jabatkum kathratukum falam tughni `ankum shay-an waḍāqat `alaykumul-arḍu bimā raḥubat thumma wallaytum mudbirīn
thumma anzalallāhu sakīnatahu `alā rasūlihi wa`alal-mu-minīna wa-anzala junūdal lam tarawhā wa`adhhabal ladhīna kafarū ۚ wadhālika jazā-ul kāfirīn
thumma yatūbullāhu min ba`di dhālika `alā man yashā-u ۗ wallāhu ghafūrun raḥīm
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū innamal mushrikūna najasun falā yaqrabul masjidal ḥarāma ba`da `āmihim hādhā ۚ wa in khiftum `aylatan fasawfa yughnīkumullāhu min faḍlihi in shā-a ۚ innallāha `alīmun ḥakīm

qātilul ladhīna lā yu-minūna billāhi walā bil yawmil-ākhiri walā yuḥarrimūna mā ḥarramallāhu warasūluhu walā yadīnūna dīnal ḥaqqi minal ladhīna ūtul kitāba ḥattā yu`ṭul jizyata `an yadin wahum ṣāghirūn
waqālatil yahūdu `uzayrunib-nullāhi waqālatin naṣāral masīḥub-nullāh ۖ dhālika qawluhum bi-afwāhihim ۖ yuḍāhi-ūna qawlal ladhīna kafarū min qabl ۚ qātalahumullāh ۚ annā yu-fakūn
ittakhadhū aḥbārahum waruhbānahum arbāban min dūnillāhi wal masīḥab-na maryama wa mā umirū illā liya`budū ilāhan wāḥidā ۖ lā ilāha illā huw ۚ subḥānahu `ammā yushrikūn
yurīdūna an yuṭfi-ū nūrallāhi bi-afwāhihim waya-ballāhu illā an yutimma nūrahu walaw karihal kāfirūn
huwal ladhī arsala rasūlahu bil hudā wadīnil ḥaqqi liyuẓhirahu `alad dīni kullihi walaw karihal mushrikūn

yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū inna kathīran minal-aḥbāri war ruhbāni laya-kulūna amwālan nāsi bil bāṭili wayaṣuddūna `an sabīlillāh ۗ wal ladhīna yaknizūnadh dhahaba wal fiḍḍata walā yunfiqūnahā fī sabīlillāhi fabashhirhum bi`adhābin alīm
yawma yuḥmā `alayhā fī nāri jahannama fatukwā bihā jibāhuhum wajunūbuhum waẓuhūruhum ۖ hādhā mā kanaztum li-anfusikum fadhūqū mā kuntum taknizūn

inna `iddatash shuhūri `indallāhith-nā `ashara shahran fī kitābillāhi yawma khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa minhā arba`atun ḥurum ۚ dhālikad dīnul qayyim ۚ falā taẓlimū fīhinna anfusakum ۚ waqātilul mushrikīna kāffatan kamā yuqātilūnakum kāffah ۚ wa`lamū annallāha ma`al muttaqīn

innaman nasī-u ziyādatun fil kufr ۖ yuḍallu bihil ladhīna kafarū yuḥillūnahu `āman wayuḥarrimūnahu `āmal liyuwāṭi-ū `iddata mā ḥarramallāhu fayuḥillū mā ḥarramallāh ۚ zuyyina lahum sū-u a`mālihim ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmal kāfirīn
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū mā lakum idhā qīla lakumun-firū fī sabīlillāhith-hāqaltum ilal-arḍ ۚ araḍītum bil ḥayātid dunyā minal-ākhirah ۚ famā matā`ul ḥayātid dunyā fil-ākhirati illā qalīl
illā tanfirū yu`adhhibkum `adhāban alīman wayastabdil qawman ghayrakum walā taḍurrūhu shay-ā ۗ wallāhu `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

illā tanṣurūhu faqad naṣarahullāhu idh akhrajahul ladhīna kafarū thāniyath-nayni idh humā fil ghāri idh yaqūlu liṣāḥibihi lā taḥzan innallāha ma`anā ۖ fa-anzalallāhu sakīnatahu `alayhi wa-ayyadahu bijunūdin lam tarawhā waja`ala kalimatal ladhīna kafarus suflā ۗ wakalimatullāhi hiyal `ulyā ۗ wallāhu `azīzun ḥakīm
in-firū khifāfan wathiqālan wajāhidū bi-amwālikum wa-anfusikum fī sabīlillāh ۚ dhālikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta`lamūn

law kāna `araḍan qarīban wasafaran qāṣidal lattaba`ūka walākin ba`udat `alayhimush shuqqah ۚ wasayaḥlifūna billāhi lawis-taṭa`nā lakharajnā ma`akum yuhlikūna anfusahum wallāhu ya`lamu innahum lakādhibūn
`afallāhu `anka lima adhinta lahum ḥattā yatabayyana lakal ladhīna ṣadaqū wata`lamal kādhibīn
lā yasta-dhinukal ladhīna yu-minūna billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri an yujāhidū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim ۗ wallāhu `alīmun bil muttaqīn
innamā yasta-dhinukal ladhīna lā yu-minūna billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri wartābat qulūbuhum fahum fī raybihim yataraddadūn
walaw arādul khurūja la-a`addū lahu `uddatan walākin karihallāhun-bi`āthahum fathabbaṭahum waqīlaq-`udū ma`al qā`idīn
law kharajū fīkum mā zādūkum illā khabālan wala-awḍa`ū khilālakum yabghūnakumul fitnata wafīkum sammā`ūna lahum ۗ wallāhu `alīmun biẓ ẓālimīn
laqadib-taghawul fitnata min qablu waqallabū lakal-umūra ḥattā jā-al ḥaqqu waẓahara amrullāhi wahum kārihūn
wa minhum man yaqūlu-dhan lī walā taftinnī ۚ alā fil fitnati saqaṭū ۗ wa inna jahannama lamuḥīṭatun bil kāfirīn
in tuṣibka ḥasanatun tasu-hum ۖ wa in tuṣibka muṣībatun yaqūlū qad akhadhnā amranā min qablu wayatawallaw wahum fariḥūn
qul lan yuṣībanā illā mā kataballāhu lanā huwa mawlānā ۚ wa`alallāhi falyatawakkalil mu-minūn
qul hal tarabbaṣūna binā illā iḥdal ḥusnayayn ۖ wanaḥnu natarabbaṣu bikum an yuṣībakumullāhu bi`adhābin min `indihi aw bi-aydīnā ۖ fatarabbaṣū innā ma`akum mutarabbiṣūn
qul anfiqū ṭaw`an aw karhal lan yutaqabbala minkum ۖ innakum kuntum qawman fāsiqīn
wa mā mana`ahum an tuqbala minhum nafaqātuhum illā annahum kafarū billāhi wabirasūlihi walā ya-tūnaṣ ṣalāta illā wahum kusālā walā yunfiqūna illā wahum kārihūn
falā tu`jibka amwāluhum walā awlāduhum ۚ innamā yurīdullāhu liyu`adhhibahum bihā fil ḥayātid dunyā watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kāfirūn
wayaḥlifūna billāhi innahum laminkum wa mā hum minkum walākinnahum qawmun yafraqūn
law yajidūna malja-an aw maghārātin aw muddakhalal lawallaw ilayhi wahum yajmaḥūn
wa minhum man yal-mizuka fiṣ ṣadaqāti fa-in u`ṭū minhā raḍū wa in lam yu`ṭaw minhā idhā hum yaskhaṭūn
walaw annahum raḍū mā ātāhumullāhu warasūluhu waqālū ḥasbunallāhu sayu-tīnallāhu min faḍlihi warasūluhu innā ilallāhi rāghibūn
innamaṣ ṣadaqātu lilfuqarā-i wal masākīni wal `āmilīna `alayhā wal mu-allafati qulūbuhum wafir riqābi wal ghārimīna wafī sabīlillāhi wabnis sabīl ۖ farīḍatan minallāh ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

wa minhumul ladhīna yu-dhūnan nabiyya wayaqūlūna huwa udhun ۚ qul udhunu khayrin lakum yu-minu billāhi wayu-minu lil-mu-minīna waraḥmatun lilladhīna āmanū minkum ۚ wal ladhīna yu-dhūna rasūlallāhi lahum `adhābun alīm
yaḥlifūna billāhi lakum liyurḍūkum wallāhu warasūluhu aḥaqqu an yurḍūhu in kānū mu-minīn
alam ya`lamū annahu man yuḥādidillāha warasūlahu fa-anna lahu nāra jahannama khālidan fīhā ۚ dhālikal khizyul `aẓīm
yaḥdharul munāfiqūna an tunazzala `alayhim sūratun tunabbi-uhum bimā fī qulūbihim ۚ qulis-tahzi-ū innallāha mukhrijun mā taḥdharūn
wala-in sa-altahum layaqūlunna innamā kunnā nakhūḍu wanal`ab ۚ qul abillāhi wa-āyātihi warasūlihi kuntum tastahzi-ūn
lā ta`tadhirū qad kafartum ba`da-iymānikum ۚ in na`fu `an ṭā-ifatim minkum nu`adhhib ṭā-ifatan bi-annahum kānū mujrimīn
al-munāfiqūna wal munāfiqātu ba`ḍuhum min ba`ḍ ۚ ya-murūna bil munkari wayanhawna `anil ma`rūfi wayaqbiḍūna aydiyahum ۚ nasullāha fanasiyahum ۗ innal munāfiqīna humul fāsiqūn
wa`adallāhul munāfiqīna wal munāfiqāti wal kuffāra nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā ۚ hiya ḥasbuhum ۚ wala`anahumullāh ۖ walahum `adhābun muqīm

kal ladhīna min qablikum kānū ashadda minkum quwwatan wa-akthara amwālan wa-awlādan fastamta`ū bikhalāqihim fastamta`tum bikhalāqikum kamas-tamta`al ladhīna min qablikum bikhalāqihim wakhuḍtum kal ladhī khāḍū ۚ ulā-ika ḥabiṭat a`māluhum fid dunyā wal-ākhirah ۖ wa-ulā-ika humul khāsirūn

alam ya-tihim naba-ul ladhīna min qablihim qawmi nūḥin wa`ādin wathamūda waqawmi ibrāhīma wa-aṣ-ḥābi madyana wal mu-tafikāt ۚ atat-hum rusuluhum bil bayyināt ۖ famā kānallāhu liyaẓlimahum walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn

wal mu-minūna wal mu-minātu ba`ḍuhum awliyā-u ba`ḍ ۚ ya-murūna bil ma`rūfi wayanhawna `anil munkari wayuqīmūnaṣ ṣalāta wayu-tūnaz zakāta wayuṭī`ūnallāha warasūlah ۚ ulā-ika sayarḥamuhumullāh ۗ innallāha `azīzun ḥakīm
wa`adallāhul mu-minīna wal mu-mināti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wa masākina ṭayyibatan fī jannāti `adn ۚ wariḍwānun minallāhi akbar ۚ dhālika huwal fawzul `aẓīm
yā-ayyuhan nabiyyu jāhidil kuffāra wal munāfiqīna waghluẓ `alayhim ۚ wa ma-wāhum jahannam ۖ wabi-sal maṣīr

yaḥlifūna billāhi mā qālū walaqad qālū kalimatal kufri wakafarū ba`da islāmihim wahammū bimā lam yanālū ۚ wa mā naqamū illā an aghnāhumullāhu warasūluhu min faḍlih ۚ fa-in yatūbū yaku khayral lahum ۖ wa in yatawallaw yu`adhhibhumullāhu `adhāban alīman fid dunyā wal-ākhirah ۚ wa mā lahum fil-arḍi min waliyyin walā naṣīr
wa minhum man `āhadallāha la-in ātānā min faḍlihi lanaṣṣaddaqanna walanakūnanna minaṣ ṣāliḥīn
falammā ātāhum min faḍlihi bakhilū bihi watawallaw wahum mu`riḍūn
fa-a`qabahum nifāqan fī qulūbihim ilā yawmi yalqawnahu bimā akhlafullāha mā wa`adūhu wabimā kānū yakdhibūn
alam ya`lamū annallāha ya`lamu sirrahum wanajwāhum wa-annallāha `allāmul ghuyūb
alladhīna yal-mizūnal muṭṭawwi`īna minal mu-minīna fiṣ ṣadaqāti wal ladhīna lā yajidūna illā juhdahum fayaskharūna minhum sakhirallāhu minhum walahum `adhābun alīm
is-taghfir lahum aw lā tastaghfir lahum in tastaghfir lahum sab`īna marratan falan yaghfirallāhu lahum ۚ dhālika bi-annahum kafarū billāhi warasūlih ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmal fāsiqīn
fariḥal mukhallafūna bimaq`adihim khilāfa rasūlillāhi wakarihū an yujāhidū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim fī sabīlillāhi waqālū lā tanfirū fil ḥarr ۗ qul nāru jahannama ashaddu ḥarrā ۚ law kānū yafqahūn
falyaḍ-ḥakū qalīlan walyabkū kathīran jazā-an bimā kānū yaksibūn
fa-in raja`akallāhu ilā ṭā-ifatim minhum fasta-dhanūka lilkhurūji faqul lan takhrujū ma`iya abadan walan tuqātilū ma`iya `aduwwā ۖ innakum raḍītum bil qu`ūdi awwala marratin faq`udū ma`al khālifīn
walā tuṣalli `alā aḥadin minhum māta abadan walā taqum `alā qabrih ۖ innahum kafarū billāhi warasūlihi wa mātū wahum fāsiqūn
walā tu`jibka amwāluhum wa-awlāduhum ۚ innamā yurīdullāhu an yu`adhhibahum bihā fid dunyā watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kāfirūn
wa idhā unzilat sūratun an āminū billāhi wajāhidū ma`a rasūlihis-ta-dhanaka uluṭ ṭawli minhum waqālū dharnā nakun ma`al qā`idīn
raḍū bi-an yakūnū ma`al khawālifi waṭubi`a `alā qulūbihim fahum lā yafqahūn
lākinir rasūlu wal ladhīna āmanū ma`ahu jāhadū bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim ۚ wa-ulā-ika lahumul khayrāt ۖ wa-ulā-ika humul mufliḥūn
a`addallāhu lahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā ۚ dhālikal fawzul `aẓīm
wajā-al mu`adhhirūna minal-a`rābi liyu-dhana lahum waqa`adal ladhīna kadhabullāha warasūlah ۚ sayuṣībul ladhīna kafarū minhum `adhābun alīm
laysa `alaḍ ḍu`afā-i walā `alal-marḍā walā `alal ladhīna lā yajidūna mā yunfiqūna ḥarajun idhā naṣaḥū lillāhi warasūlih ۚ mā `alal-muḥsinīna min sabīl ۚ wallāhu ghafūrun raḥīm
walā `alal ladhīna idhā mā atawka litaḥmilahum qulta lā ajidu mā aḥmilukum `alayhi tawallaw wa-a`yunuhum tafīḍu minad dam`i ḥazanan allā yajidū mā yunfiqūn
innamas sabīlu `alal ladhīna yasta-dhinūnaka wahum aghniyā-u ۚ raḍū bi-an yakūnū ma`al khawālifi waṭaba`allāhu `alā qulūbihim fahum lā ya`lamūn

ya`tadhirūna ilaykum idhā raja`tum ilayhim ۚ qul lā ta`tadhirū lan nu-mina lakum qad nabba-anallāhu min akhbārikum ۚ wasayarallāhu `amalakum warasūluhu thumma turaddūna ilā `ālimil ghaybi wash shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn
sayaḥlifūna billāhi lakum idhan-qalabtum ilayhim litu`riḍū `anhum ۖ fa-a`riḍū `anhum ۖ innahum rijs ۖ wa ma-wāhum jahannamu jazā-an bimā kānū yaksibūn
yaḥlifūna lakum litarḍaw `anhum ۖ fa-in tarḍaw `anhum fa-innallāha lā yarḍā `anil qawmil fāsiqīn
al-a`rābu ashaddu kufran wanifāqan wa-ajdaru allā ya`lamū ḥudūda mā anzalallāhu `alā rasūlih ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm
wa minal-a`rābi man yattakhidhu mā yunfiqu maghraman wayatarabbaṣu bikumud dawā-ir ۚ `alayhim dā-iratus saw-i ۗ wallāhu samī`un `alīm

wa minal-a`rābi man yu-minu billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri wayattakhidhu mā yunfiqu qurubātin `indallāhi waṣalawātir rasūl ۚ alā innahā qurbatun lahum ۚ sayudkhiluhumullāhu fī raḥmatih ۗ innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm

was sābiqūnal-awwalūna minal muhājirīna wal-anṣāri wal ladhīnat-taba`ūhum bi-iḥsānin raḍiyallāhu `anhum waraḍū `anhu wa-a`adda lahum jannātin tajrī taḥtahal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā ۚ dhālikal fawzul `aẓīm
wa mimman ḥawlakum minal-a`rābi munāfiqūn ۖ wa min ahlil madīnah ۖ maradū `alan nifāqi lā ta`lamuhum ۖ naḥnu na`lamuhum ۚ sanu`adhhibuhum marratayni thumma yuraddūna ilā `adhābin `aẓīm
wa-ākharūna'-tarafū bidhunūbihim khalaṭū `amalan ṣāliḥan wa-ākhara sayyi-an `asallāhu an yatūba `alayhim ۚ innallāha ghafūrun raḥīm
khudh min amwālihim ṣadaqatan tuṭahhiruhum watuzakkīhim bihā waṣalli `alayhim ۖ inna ṣalātaka sakanul lahum ۗ wallāhu samī`un `alīm
alam ya`lamū annallāha huwa yaqbalut tawbata `an `ibādihi waya-khudhuṣ ṣadaqāti wa-annallāha huwat tawwābur raḥīm
waquli'-malū fasayarallāhu `amalakum warasūluhu wal mu-minūn ۖ wasaturaddūna ilā `ālimil ghaybi wash shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn
wa-ākharūna murjawna li-amrillāhi immā yu`adhhibuhum wa immā yatūbu `alayhim ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

wal ladhīnat-takhadhū masjidan ḍirāran wakufran watafrīqan baynal mu-minīna wa irṣādal liman ḥāraballāha warasūlahu min qabl ۚ walayaḥlifunna in aradnā illal-ḥusnā ۖ wallāhu yash-hadu innahum lakādhibūn
lā taqum fīhi abadā ۚ lamasjidun ussisa `alat taqwā min awwali yawmin aḥaqqu an taqūma fīh ۚ fīhi rijālun yuḥibbūna an yataṭahharū ۚ wallāhu yuḥibbul muṭṭahhirīn
afaman assasa bunyānahu `alā taqwā minallāhi wariḍwānin khayrun am man assasa bunyānahu `alā shafā jurufin hārin fanhāra bihi fī nāri jahannam ۗ wallāhu lā yahdil qawmaẓ ẓālimīn
lā yazālu bunyānuhumul ladhī banaw rībatan fī qulūbihim illā an taqaṭṭa`a qulūbuhum ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

innallāhash-tarā minal mu-minīna anfusahum wa-amwālahum bi-anna lahumul jannah ۚ yuqātilūna fī sabīlillāhi fayaqtulūna wayuqtalūn ۖ wa`dan `alayhi ḥaqqan fit tawrāti wal-injīli wal qur-ān ۚ wa man awfā bi`ahdihi minallāh ۚ fastabshirū bibay`ikumul ladhī bāya`tum bih ۚ wadhālika huwal fawzul `aẓīm
at-tā-ibūnal `ābidūnal ḥāmidūnas sā-iḥūnar rāki`ūnas sājidūnal-āmirūna bil ma`rūfi wan nāhūna `anil munkari wal ḥāfiẓūna liḥudūdillāh ۗ wabashhiril mu-minīn
mā kāna linnabiyyi wal ladhīna āmanū an yastaghfirū lil-mushrikīna walaw kānū ulī qurbā min ba`di mā tabayyana lahum annahum aṣ-ḥābul jaḥīm
wa mā kānas-tighfāru ibrāhīma li-abīhi illā `an maw`idatin wa`adahā iyyāhu falammā tabayyana lahu annahu `aduwwul lillāhi tabarra-a minh ۚ inna ibrāhīma la-awwāhun ḥalīm
wa mā kānallāhu liyuḍilla qawman ba`da idh hadāhum ḥattā yubayyina lahum mā yattaqūn ۚ innallāha bikulli shay-in `alīm
innallāha lahu mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ yuḥyī wayumīt ۚ wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi min waliyyin walā naṣīr
laqad tāballāhu `alan nabiyyi wal muhājirīna wal-anṣāril ladhīnat-taba`ūhu fī sā`atil `usrati min ba`di mā kāda yazīghu qulūbu farīqin minhum thumma tāba `alayhim ۚ innahu bihim ra-ūfun raḥīm

wa`alath thalāthatil ladhīna khullifū ḥattā idhā ḍāqat `alayhimul-arḍu bimā raḥubat waḍāqat `alayhim anfusuhum waẓannū an lā malja-a minallāhi illā ilayhi thumma tāba `alayhim liyatūbū ۚ innallāha huwat tawwābur raḥīm
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanut-taqullāha wakūnū ma`aṣ ṣādiqīn

mā kāna li-ahlil madīnati wa man ḥawlahum minal-a`rābi an yatakhallafū `an rasūlillāhi walā yarghabū bi-anfusihim `an nafsih ۚ dhālika bi-annahum lā yuṣībuhum ẓama-un walā naṣabun walā makhmaṣatun fī sabīlillāhi walā yaṭa-ūna mawṭi-an yaghīẓul kuffāra walā yanālūna min `aduwwin naylan illā kutiba lahum bihi `amalun ṣāliḥ ۚ innallāha lā yuḍī`u ajral muḥsinīn
walā yunfiqūna nafaqatan ṣaghīratan walā kabīratan walā yaqṭa`ūna wādiyan illā kutiba lahum liyajziyahumullāhu aḥsana mā kānū ya`malūn
wa mā kānal mu-minūna liyanfirū kāffah ۚ falawlā nafara min kulli firqatim minhum ṭā-ifatun liyatafaqqahū fid dīni waliyundhirū qawmahum idhā raja`ū ilayhim la`allahum yaḥdharūn
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū qātilul ladhīna yalūnakum minal kuffāri walyajidū fīkum ghilẓah ۚ wa`lamū annallāha ma`al muttaqīn
wa idhā mā unzilat sūratun faminhum man yaqūlu ayyukum zādat-hu hādhihi-iymānā ۚ fa-ammal ladhīna āmanū fazādat-hum-iymānan wahum yastabshirūn
wa-ammal ladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun fazādat-hum rijsan ilā rijsihim wa mātū wahum kāfirūn
awalā yarawna annahum yuftanūna fī kulli `āmin marratan aw marratayni thumma lā yatūbūna walā hum yadhhakkarūn
wa idhā mā unzilat sūratun naẓara ba`ḍuhum ilā ba`ḍin hal yarākum min aḥadin thumman-ṣarafū ۚ ṣarafallāhu qulūbahum bi-annahum qawmul lā yafqahūn
laqad jā-akum rasūlun min anfusikum `azīzun `alayhi mā `anittum ḥarīṣun `alaykum bil mu-minīna ra-ūfun raḥīm
fa-in tawallaw faqul ḥasbiyallāhu lā ilāha illā huw ۖ `alayhi tawakkalt ۖ wahuwa rabbul `arshil `aẓīm
